{"city": "San Pablo", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "1651 Folsom Ave,", "phone": "510-815-5651", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food San Pablo Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Davis Park Community Center , 1651 Folsom Ave, San Pablo , 2nd & 4th Friday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. San Pablo City Hall , 1000 Gateway Ave, San Pablo , 2nd & 4th Saturday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Mobile Pantry Distribution Families and individuals can pick up FREE fresh produce, proteins, dairy and a variety of nonperishable food once or twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Contra Costa College , 2600 Mission Bell Dr, San Pablo , 1st & 3rd Monday 1:30-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Anchor of Life Church , 2707 17th St, San Pablo , Wednesday 4:30-6:00pm. Phone: 510-815-5651 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Contra Costa College Pantry , 2600 Mission Bell Dr, San Pablo , Wednesday 10:30-11:30am.
							Located at a Farmers market. Distribution is held infront of the Student and Administration Building. Open to anyone! Phone: 510-215-4796 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Family Church Ministries , 1452 Rumrill Blvd, San Pablo , Wednesday 10:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 510-867-5957 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. San Pablo Food Pantry , 2301 Rumrill Blvd Rm 27, San Pablo , Monday 12:00-1:30pm 
Wednesday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Monday distributions: No appointment necessary. Please bring two bags.

Wednesday distributions: If you need assistance with a pre-packed box, please call the day-of between 10-11 am to arrange an appointment. Limit of one pre-packed box every three months per household. Phone: 510-232-0258 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Paul Conference SVdP , 1850 Church Lane, San Pablo , Thursday 11:00am-2:00pm. Phone: 510-691-6404 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). San Pablo Library - Community Room , 13751 San Pablo Ave, San Pablo , 1st & 3rd Friday 9:30-10:30am.
							Main Entrance can be found on Church Lane. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
Fairfield, CA 94533 GET HELP Find Food CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Contact Us 855-309-FOOD (3663) info@foodbankccs.org How to Help Ways to Give Donate Food Volunteer Advocate Become a Partner Agency Food Bank Updates Blog Events Newsroom Newsletter Sign-up Careers Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Linkedin 501(c)(3) Organization | Federal Tax ID# 94-2418054 Copyright © 2025 Cookie Settings This institution is an equal opportunity provider | Site Map | Privacy Policy Website Design and Development by MIGHTYminnow", "latitude": 37.960974712838, "longitude": -122.352779210709, "source": "food_bank_of_contra_costa_and_solano_ca", "food_bank": "Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano"}
